import Head from 'next/head' import styles from '../styles/Home.module.css' import LoginLayout from '../components/layouts/loginLayout' import Link from 'next/link' import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; const LoginPage = ({pageProps}) => { const {register, handleSubmit, errors} = useForm(); const onSubmit = formData => { alert(JSON.stringify(formData)) } const emailPattern = /^(([^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/ const passwordPattern = /^(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[0-9])(?=.*[!@#$%^&*])(?=.{8,})/ return ( <> Admin | Login
